title: God of War Ragnarok Reviews: Has GOTY Been Decided? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.04.22
description:
Tim and Blessing do a God of War Ragnarok review round up, talk a bunch of Kojima headlines, and talk about Square Enix's NFT game.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:35 - Housekeeping

A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now and it’s a God of War Ragnarok FAQ. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Barrett's God of War Special Presentation is OUT NOW! Join him as he looks back at Kratos' entire journey so far to answer the question, "Can Kratos Be Better?" Watch it and get hyped for God of War Ragnarok RIGHT NOW on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!

The Roper Report  -

00:05:35 - God of War Ragnarok review round up
00:28:54 - Ad
00:31:47 - Footage of Hideo Kojima’s unannounced ‘Overdose’ has seemingly leaked
00:37:02 - Kojima has turned down acquisition offers
00:41:24 - Kojima responds to Abandoned rumors
00:45:27 - Marvel Snap is getting its PvP mode later this year
00:48:34 - Square Enix has announced a playable ‘NFT collectible art experience’
00:53:17 - PSA: Sonic Frontiers Spoilers Have Begun to Leak
00:55:20 - Out today
00:58:52 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg and Tim
